item.title: By: Lee
item.dc:creator: Lee
item.description: <p>That's so cool! Thank you! You're the best RSS source for train 'happenings' I'm aware of. Seriously! As if the route between Brick Hell (Bracknell) and Richmond weren't bad enough, now I know if I *were* to be a offered a contract with the idea of crashing at friends in Kewe, to regard it as mere folley!</p>
item.content:encoded: That’s so cool! Thank you! You’re the best RSS source for train ‘happenings’ I’m aware of. Seriously! As if the route between Brick Hell (Bracknell) and Richmond weren’t bad enough, now I know if I *were* to be a offered a contract with the idea of crashing at friends in Kewe, to regard it as mere folley!
